author: iSazonov
body:
.Net 5.0 introduced a code analyzer which utilize [SupportedOSPlatform attribute](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/api/system.runtime.versioning.supportedosplatformattribute)/[UnsupportedOSPlatform](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/api/system.runtime.versioning.unsupportedosplatformattribute)

We use many P/Invokes and other OS specific APIs and we could annotate such API-s with SupportedOSPlatform/UnsupportedOSPlatform attributes.

.Net user story https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/43616

Samples https://source.dot.net/#System.Private.CoreLib/PlatformAttributes.cs,c486a73ae41fb2df,references

comments.author: danmoseley
comments.body: Reach out to @terrajobst or @jeffhandley if you have questions.

comments.author: danmoseley
comments.body:
did you end up using it @iSazonov ?
cc @buyaa-n

title: Benefit from SupportedOSPlatform/UnsupportedOSPlatform
